id.description: The unique identifier for the epic.

kind.description: A type or category associated with the epic.

description.description: A brief overview or summary of the epic.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the epic was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the epic was last updated.

project_id.description: The identifier of the project to which the epic belongs.

name.description: The name or title of the epic.

url.description: The URL link to access more details about the epic.

label.description: A label or tag assigned to the epic.
